meanings.definition: A device used to measure work or energy expended.
meanings.sent1: The ergometers in the lab helped calculate the energy used during the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The gym installed new ergometers to track the calories burned by the users.
meanings.sent3: The ergometers at the science fair were a hit, showing how much effort was put into each project.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her studies was like an ergometer, always measuring the amount of work she put in.
meanings.sent5: The ergometers hummed quietly, recording the energy output of the athletes.

meanings.definition: A machine used for physical exercise.
meanings.sent1: At the gym, the ergometers were always in use for cardio workouts.
meanings.sent2: The physical therapist recommended using the ergometers to improve leg strength.
meanings.sent3: The ergometers at the gym seemed to challenge everyone to pedal faster and harder.
meanings.sent4: His determination to beat his own record on the ergometer was inspiring to others.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic sound of the ergometers filled the gym, signaling a productive workout session.
